game.title: The Lost Treasure of El Dorado
game.objective: Find the legendary city of gold, El Dorado.
game.description: Rumor has it that a great treasure awaits in the heart of the Amazon rainforest. Gather your supplies and set out on this adventure to uncover the lost treasure!
game.reward: Gold coins, precious gems, and legendary artifacts.

task.objective: Obtain a map to El Dorado from the local library.
task.description: The map is rumored to be in an old, dusty book located deep within the library.
You'll need food, water, a tent, and a machete to clear the dense jungle.
